enhanced_by.reason: Setting parameters is necessary to configure the validation context before invoking the validate method.
The form name must be set to determine which validation rules to apply during the validation process.
Setting the field name is optional but can be used to validate a specific field within the form.
The validate method retrieves the form to be validated, and the getForm method provides similar functionality by retrieving the form based on locale and form key.
The validate method internally calls the validate method of the Form class, which performs the actual validation logic.
